verses.verse: <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H3426>now<s%>, if there be any that will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6918>you<s%>; and to which of the saints will you <S%H6437>turn<s%>?
For <S%H3708>wrath<s%> <S%H2026>kills<s%> the foolish <S%H191>man<s%>, and <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H4191>slays<s%> the silly <S%H6601>one<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> taking <S%H8327>root<s%>: but <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> I <S%H5344>cursed<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.
His <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3468>safety<s%>, and they are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, neither is there any to deliver <S%H5337>them<s%>.

Whose <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> eat <S%H398>up<s%>, and <S%H3947>takes<s%> it even <S%H413>out<s%> of the <S%H6791>thorns<s%>, and the <S%H6782>robber<s%> swallows <S%H7602>up<s%> their <S%H2428>substance<s%>.
Although <S%H205>affliction<s%> comes not <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, neither does <S%H5999>trouble<s%> spring <S%H6779>out<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>;
Yet <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H5999>trouble<s%>, as the <S%H1121>sparks<s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H1361>upward<s%>.
I would <S%H199>seek<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, and unto <S%H430>God<s%> would I <S%H7760>commit<s%> my <S%H1700>cause<s%>:
Which <S%H6213>does<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> and <S%H369>unsearchable<s%>; marvelous <S%H6381>things<s%> without <S%H4557>number<s%>:
Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H2351>fields<s%>:
To set <S%H7760>up<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%> those that be <S%H8217>low<s%>; that those which <S%H6937>mourn<s%> may be <S%H7682>exalted<s%> to <S%H3468>safety<s%>.
He <S%H6565>disappoints<s%> the <S%H4284>devices<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty<s%>, so that their <S%H3027>hands<s%> cannot <S%H6213>perform<s%> their <S%H8454>enterprise<s%>.
He <S%H3920>takes<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H6193>craftiness<s%>: and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6617>perverse<s%> is carried <S%H4116>headlong<s%>.
They <S%H6298>meet<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, and <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H6672>noonday<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
But he <S%H3467>saves<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, from their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2389>mighty<s%>.
So the <S%H1800>poor<s%> has <S%H8615>hope<s%>, and <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H7092>stops<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H835>Behold<s%>, happy is the <S%H582>man<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3198>corrects<s%>: therefore <S%H3988>despise<s%> not you the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>:
For he makes <S%H3510>sore<s%>, and binds <S%H2280>up<s%>: he <S%H4272>wounds<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> make <S%H7495>whole<s%>.
He shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%>: <S%H7651>Yes<s%>, in seven there shall no <S%H7451>evil<s%> touch <S%H5060>you<s%>.
In <S%H7458>famine<s%> he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you from <S%H4194>death<s%>: and in <S%H4421>war<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
You shall be <S%H2244>hid<s%> from the <S%H7752>scourge<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%>: neither shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7701>destruction<s%> when it <S%H935>comes<s%>.
At <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> you shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%>: neither shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
For you shall be in <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be at peace with <S%H7999>you<s%>.
And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> shall be in <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and you shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5116>habitation<s%>, and shall not <S%H2398>sin<s%>.
You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> also that your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7227>great<s%>, and your <S%H6631>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
You shall <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in a full <S%H3624>age<s%>, like as a shock of <S%H1430>corn<s%> comes <S%H5927>in<s%> in his <S%H6256>season<s%>.
Behold <S%H2713>this<s%>, we have searched <S%H8085>it<s%>, so it is; hear <S%H3045>it<s%>, and know you it for your good.
